COLLECTIONS.TITLE: {{user.username}}'s collections
COLLECTIONS.DESCRIPTION: Here you can see all the collections published by {{user.username}}. You can also create your own collection to group your favorite cards together.

NO_COLLECTIONS_CTA.TITLE: Create your first collection today!
NO_COLLECTIONS_CTA.DESCRIPTION: You can create a collection to group your favorite cards together. Start earning money today!

NO_COLLECTIONS_ALT.TITLE: {{user.username}} has no collections yet
NO_COLLECTIONS_ALT.DESCRIPTION: Looks like {{user.username}} has no collections published yet.

MY_COLLECTIONS.TITLE: My collections
MY_COLLECTIONS.DESCRIPTION: Here you can see all the collections you have published. You can also create a new collection to group your favorite cards together.

NEW_COLLECTION.TITLE: Let's create your new collection!
NEW_COLLECTION.DESCRIPTION:
This wizard will help you create a new collection.
You will be able to customize it to your liking and review it before creating it

REVIEW.TITLE: Review
REVIEW.DESCRIPTION: Review your collection before creating it.

EDIT_COLLECTION.TITLE: Edit collection
EDIT_COLLECTION.DESCRIPTION: Here you can edit the information of your collection.

PUBLISH_COLLECTION.TITLE: Publish collection
PUBLISH_COLLECTION.DESCRIPTION: By publishing your collection, you agree to the terms and conditions and privacy policy of the platform. Failure to comply with these rules may result in a ban from the platform.

BOX.TITLE: Publish "{{collection.name}}" collection
BOX.DESCRIPTION: Make "{{collection.name}}" collection public and available to all users of the platform.

VERIFICATION_AND_SAFETY.TITLE: Verification and safety
VERIFICATION_AND_SAFETY.BANK_ACCOUNT: Your account must have a bank account linked to it.
VERIFICATION_AND_SAFETY.30_DAYS: You must have been a member for at least 30 days.

BASIC_INFORMATION.TITLE: Basic information
BASIC_INFORMATION.NAME: Your collection must have a name.
BASIC_INFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Your collection must have a description and needs to be 32 characters long.

CUSTOMIZATION.TITLE: Customization
CUSTOMIZATION.IMAGE: Your collection must have an image.

CONTENT.TITLE: Content
CONTENT.PUBLISHED_CARDS: Your collection must have at least 10 published cards.

MODAL.TITLE: Are you sure you want to publish this collection?
MODAL.DESCRIPTION: By publishing your collection, you agree to the terms and conditions and privacy policy of the platform.

UNPUBLISH_COLLECTION.TITLE: Unpublish collection
UNPUBLISH_COLLECTION.DESCRIPTION: By unpublishing your collection, you will make it private and it will no longer be available to other users of the platform until you decide to publish it again.

BOX.TITLE: Unpublish "{{collection.name}}" collection
BOX.DESCRIPTION: Make "{{collection.name}}" collection private and only available to you.

WARNING.TITLE: Before you unpublish your collection
WARNING.HIDDEN: Your collection will be unavailable for other users.
WARNING.NO_MONEY: You will not be able to earn more money from your collection until you publish it again.
WARNING.NO_CARDS: Users will not be able to redeem cards from your collection until you publish it again.

MODAL.TITLE: Are you sure you want to unpublish this collection?
MODAL.DESCRIPTION: By unpublishing your collection, you will make it private and it will no longer be available to other users of the platform until you decide to publish it again.
